## Installation

### Groovy
Add the following dependency to your `build.gradle` file on app module:

```gradle
dependencies {
    implementation 'com.fappslab.tourtip:tourtip:$VERSION_NAME'
}
```

### Kotlin
Add the following dependency to your `build.gradle.kts` file on app module:

```kotlin
dependencies {
    implementation("com.fappslab.tourtip:tourtip:$VERSION_NAME")
}
```
